tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    soil_moisture FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SoilData ( 
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensor_id INT, 
  soil_moisture DECIMAL, 
  soil_temperature DECIMAL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  temperature DOUBLE,
  moisture DOUBLE,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  location VARCHAR(50),
  temperature DOUBLE,
  humidity DOUBLE,
  wind_speed DOUBLE,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SoilData (
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  ph_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SensorLocation (
  sensor_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  elevation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  nutrient_levels JSON,
  water_content FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_info (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  install_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE soil_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  ph_level FLOAT,
  nutrient_levels JSON
)

CREATE TABLE field_info (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(100),
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  area FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trends_data (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_date DATE,
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_value FLOAT
)
